name: glproto
description:
OpenGL Extension to the X Window System. This extension defines a
protocol for the client to send 3D rendering commands to the X server.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: util-macros
dependencies.description:
This is a set of autoconf macros used by the configure.ac scripts in
other Xorg modular packages, and is needed to generate new versions of
their configure scripts with autoconf.

dependent_to.name: mesa
dependent_to.description:
Mesa is an open-source implementation of the OpenGL specification - a
system for rendering interactive 3D graphics.

dependent_to.name: xdriinfo
dependent_to.description: xdriinfo - query configuration information of X11 DRI drivers.

dependent_to.name: mesa18
dependent_to.description:
Mesa is an open-source implementation of the OpenGL specification - a
system for rendering interactive 3D graphics.

dependent_to.name: xorg-server
dependent_to.description:
X.Org Server is the free and open source implementation of the display
server for the X Window System stewarded by the X.Org Foundation.
